ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:23:41 [Issue ID 4000-116981] urn:comicvine:4000-116981 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:08:42. [Issue ID 54663]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dinosaurs are being reported all over the town of Marshville while, from the prehistoric jungle, Meriem emerges onto the streets of the town she disappeared from 13 years ago.
Will and Lumpy fight for survival in the jungle as Meriem reunites with an old acquaintance.
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two: Civilization Again!!
